mapper.insert: insert into oc_user (user_id, user_pwd, user_name, user_email, user_tel, user_loc, user_hobby, user_birth, user_gender, user_pwdq, user_pwda) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pwd}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_tel}, #{user_loc}, #{user_hobby}, #{user_birth}, #{user_gender}, #{user_pwdq}, #{user_pwda})
mapper.update: update oc_user set user_pwd=#{user_pwd}, user_email=#{user_email}, user_tel=#{user_tel}, user_loc=#{user_loc}, user_hobby=#{user_hobby}, user_pwdq=#{user_pwdq}, user_pwda=#{user_pwda} where user_id=#{user_id}
update oc_user set user_image=#{user_image} where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pwd=#{user_pwd}
